replies.body: Nice try riot, we still aren't going to play urgot. {{champion:35}}

Except he was never MEANT as an adc, he was designed with to be a solo lane ranged bruiser. That would be like complaining that bard doesn't work as an ap mid... because they were never meant to be played that way
Well, he was actually _meant_ to be an adc, he just wasn't _designed_ that way, so he was never really all that good at it.
Urgot predates the concept of marksman and support duo botlane. He came out before season 1, even, before anything resembling the current meta was a thing.

> [{quoted}](name=americanErrorist,realm=NA,application-id=Ag8jgd8Q,discussion-id=9qWTE3kw,comment-id=0002000100010000,timestamp=2015-03-19T23:20:36.023+0000)
>
> Well, he was actually _meant_ to be an adc, he just wasn't _designed_ that way, so he was never really all that good at it.

He's a ranged tank/skirmisher. What part of his kit says anything resembling "ADC" to you? The part where he ults into the enemy team?

All we need now is a Dark Horses: {{champion:35}}  Mid lane
or maybe Dark Horses: {{champion:74}} Jungle

If you haven't already, I recommend looking up Shaclone.  He's a funny Youtuber who plays {{champion:35}} mid pretty often in Challenger/Master tier games.  {{champion:74}} just doesn't have enough mobility though.
Heimer should be able to ride his ulted grenades :O
Villager pls.
Rito, give heimerdinger a kassadin ult option built in to his kit. That would be healthy, I'm sure.
I've done {{champion:74}} Jungle. you can Solo dragon pretty early and late game you can easily solo baron
People play urgot?
yes, see the rare and allusive urgot player. watch as he begins his migration path from the fountain to your nexus. a beautiful and majestic beast.
Urgot is awesome.  if you suck as him thats your fault, not his
Totally agree. I use urgot a ton in the top and mid lane. Utterly destroys squishies.
{{champion:6}} is amazing.
Please stop encouraging ranged tops :(
Must be a darius main
They fur{{champion:6}}
fururgot
Wait? Is this a champion reveal or something?
LOL

{{champion:6}} Is coming at you like a dark horse....
Are you ready for, ready for
An acid storm, acid storm
Cause once you’re his, once you’re his...
There’s no going back.

Hes a beast
I call em {{champion:6}} 
He shoots your heart out
You prolly F{{champion:6}} 
Be careful
Try not to let him farm
He's on Acid
Cause he has crab arms
I heard playing Urgot gives x2 lp in ranked. :O
Too bad nobody's ever gonna find out.
I played urgot ranked once... I spanked teemo and won
I just logged on to say "F{{champion:6}}ten power"
urgod {{champion:6}}
Forget the {{champion:89}} praise the {{champion:6}}
{{champion:6}} me there, riot. That was a good one.
I thought this was already a thing
Not gonna lie. This guy is not the brightest crayon in the knife belt.
His kit isn't the reason I don't play him, it's the fact that he's a fat gross zombie robot thingy
I don't get it... I thought that was the reason why someone WOULD play him...? O.o
you know what helps with that? Seeing playing Urgot, as playing the LoL version of Darth Vader.
That's why we need battlebunny Urgot
Wait, this is considered to be breaking the meta?  I thought Urgot was most viable as a top laner?
Well it's breaking the meta because people thought he wasn't viable anywhere.
More like people quit/drop-out when they see anything other than the meta.
he is riot is pretending they made this up just now
I think we'll get Dark Horse: Evelynn Jungle soon.
redo him like sion{{champion:14}}
Please don't.

What are you saying dude, the sion rework was great... unless u were an old sion main since they completely changed his whole playstyle. And yeah hes kinda broken but at least you can (almost) dodge his abilities (E). Lol old sion was like press q and w and one shot ppl with a HUGE sheild or build ad and be useless.
RIOT, NO MY SOLO Q ;-;
Just take good ol' {{champion:58}} top and you'll be fine for the rest of the match. He will truly be F{{champion:6}}ten then {{summoner:14}}
They're trying. At least make his Q a 1.0 ratio. It's not the 1.2 bs he used to have so long ago and it's not the underpowered .85 he has now.

Lol i love how you call his .85 TOTAL ad ration underpowered compared to the 1.2 bonus ad ratio. I hope you realize that the .85 was his original ratio and when riot changed it to 1.2 bonus it was actually a nerf and people complained to get it changed back.
